alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Worcester, east central Hampshire and southeastern Franklin Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Salem, or 9 miles east of Amherst, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Belchertown, Ware, Barre, North Brookfield, Hubbardston, West Brookfield, Hardwick, Oakham, Shutesbury, Pelham, Petersham, New Braintree and New Salem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.
